incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failures to AT&T Network in US Via subset of Twilio Short Codes

incident_updates.body: Twilio SMS Short Codes were degraded for 20 minutes between 19:11 and 19:31 Pacific Time on 16/01/2024. During this period of time, customers may have experienced delivery failures to AT&T network in US. The issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Accsec Indonesia API Error

incident_updates.body: Latency and timeout errors for the Twilio Rest API have been resolved, and Twilio services: Verify Silent Network Auth is operating normally at this time.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results. We will provide an update in 12 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Failures With Branded Registrations

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have identified the issue with branded calling and are still working to deploy a fix. We expect to provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
Our engineers have identified the issue with branded calling and are working to deploy a fix. We expect to provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with branded calling. Due to this issue, customers who might have created a Voice Integrity bundle for an account before 12/6 but registered Branded Calling for that account after 12/6, might not see their calls being branded on end user handsets. We have identified a workaround for customers who are affected and this can be applied via a support ticket to Twilio's technical support team. We will update in 4 hours or as soon as we have more information.

We continue experiencing an issue with branded calling. Customers who might have created Voice Integrity bundle before 12/6 but started branded registration after 12/6 might not see their calls being branded on end user handsets. We will update in 2 hours or as soon as we have more information.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with branded calling. Due to this issue, customers who might have created Voice Integrity bundle before 12/6 but started branded registration after 12/6 might not see their calls being branded on end user handsets. We will update in 1 hour or as soon as we have more information.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with branded registrations. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Studio Flows With Timer Widgets Impacted

incident_updates.body: Studio Flows incident has been resolved and service is operating normally at this time.

The problem causing a fraction of Studio executions with timers created before 01:18 PT and expiration after 01:18 PT on 01-12-2024 has been fixed. We will continue to monitor for system stability and will provide an update in 30 minutes or sooner if more information is available.

Studio is back to normal. Any new executions relying on timers are working fine. Our engineers have identified the issue causing fraction of Studio executions that used widgets which rely on timers  created before 01:18 PT with expiration time after 01:18 PT on 01-12-2024, which would result in that execution becoming stuck, and are working to deploy a fix.  We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Studio is back to normal. Any new executions relying on timers are working fine. Our engineers have identified the issue causing fraction of Studio executions that used widgets which rely on timers  created before 01:18 PT with expiration time after 01:18 PT on 01-12-2024, which would result in that execution becoming stuck, and are working to deploy a fix.  We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We have observed an issue with Studio workflow timers that were active at 01:18 Pacific Time. Executions that used widgets which rely on timers may have been impacted, which would result in that execution becoming stuck. Our engineers are investigating this further. We will provide another update in 1 hour or soon as we have more information.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Studio workflow timers expiration. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Elevated 5xx Errors When Creating Verifications

incident_updates.body: Twilio Verify was degraded for 28 minutes between 08:44 PM and 09:12 PM Pacific Time on 01/11/2024. During this period of time customers may have experienced elevated 5xx errors when creating Verifications. The issue has now been resolved.
Our engineers are currently investigating the customer impact of a retroactive issue with Verify services. We will follow up and provide customer impact details within 2 hours.

incidents.name: Migrated Legacy WhatsApp Templates Present in Content Templates

incident_updates.body:
In preparation for making Content Templates the default solution for templates, Twilio copied over all existing templates from "WhatsApp Templates" to "Content Template Builder."

For some customers, this may cause Content API requests to exceed the page size limit. In this situation please use Pagination (https://www.twilio.com/docs/content/content-api-resources#pagination).

The incident is now resolved. Our team will separately investigate our communications process to increase transparency of these types of migrations in the future. We sincerely apologize for any impact.

We have noticed Customers are seeing migrated Legacy WhatsApp Templates in their Content Templates. Our engineers are investigating this matter. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We have noticed Customers are seeing migrated Legacy WhatsApp Templates in their Content Templates. Our engineers are investigating this matter. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

We have noticed Customers are seeing migrated Legacy WhatsApp Templates in their Content Templates. Our engineers are investigating this matter. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

We've become aware of a potential issue with Customers noticing migrated legacy WhatsApp templates in Content Templates. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Billing Services, Account Actions and Phone Numbers Impacted

incident_updates.body: Certain services were degraded for 12 minutes between 05:01 and 05:13 Pacific Time on 01-11-2024. During this period of time customers may have experienced issues related to account creation/closures, provisioning or releasing numbers from the Console/API, and errors in the Console for billing-related pages and actions. The issue has now been resolved.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with our billing services. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.
